tspan.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:400;letter-spacing: 0.23rem;font-size:35px;font-family:'Segoe UI';-inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Semi-Bold';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;fill:#fdfdfd;fill-opacity:1;stroke-width:2; paint-order: stroke; stroke: #000000; stroke-opacity:.6; stroke-width: 3px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: round;
